main event: A bright, slowly moving object was observed both vertically and horizontally on September 23, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as resembling a brightly lit star or planet., The observation lasted for 1 minute., There was a smaller object moving in a circular orbit around a larger object., The sky conditions were clear at the time of the sighting., Insufficient data was available to evaluate the case further.
sighted object: a bright object in the sky
